topic.title: United Kingdom and Ireland Association of Cancer Registries
topic.shortdesc: The United Kingdom and Ireland Association of Cancer Registries (UKIACR) brings together ORGANISATIONS with an interest in developing cancer registration as a resource for studying and controlling cancer in England, Wales, Scotland and Northern Ireland.
